main.start_message:
🌟 *Welcome to PsychoTest Bot* 🌟

I am a psychological assistant offering several scientifically validated tests:

🔹 *Personality Tests*:
- /mbti - MBTI Test (16 personalities)
- /bigfive - Big Five Traits Test (OCEAN)

🔹 *Self-Assessment Tests*:
- /depression - PHQ-9 Test (depression)
- /anxiety - GAD-7 Test (anxiety)

📌 Use the commands above or the interactive menu to start a test.

ℹ For more information: /help
main.help_message:
🆘 *Help - PsychoTest Bot* 🆘

*Available Commands*:

🔹 *Personality Tests*:
- /mbti - MBTI Typology Test (16 personalities)
- /bigfive - Big Five Personality Traits Test (OCEAN)

🔹 *Mental Health Tests*:
- /depression - PHQ-9 Test (assessment of depressive symptoms)
- /anxiety - GAD-7 Test (assessment of anxiety symptoms)

🔹 *Other Commands*:
- /start - Restart the bot
- /help - Display this message
- /cancel - Cancel an ongoing test
- /language - Change language

📝 *Important Note*:
The results provided are indicative and do not constitute a medical diagnosis. If in doubt, consult a healthcare professional.

💡 Tip: Complete multiple tests for a better understanding of yourself.
main.what_next: What would you like to do now?
main.test_cancelled_prompt: ❌ Test cancelled. What would you like to do?
main.test_cancelled_command_response: ❌ Test cancelled. Use /start to begin again or /help to see options.

mbti.name: MBTI Test

questions.question: Generally, you prefer:
options: Being alone or with a few people

questions.question: When you learn something new, you prefer:
When making a decision, you primarily rely on:
In your daily life, you prefer to:

results.INTJ: The Architect - Creative and original strategist.
results.INTP: The Logician - Theoretical innovator hungry for knowledge.
results.ENTJ: The Commander - Charismatic and visionary leader.
results.ENTP: The Innovator - Curious and clever inventor.

mbti.default_description: Description not available for this type.
mbti.summary: The MBTI is a personality indicator that categorizes individuals into 16 types.

big_five.name: Big Five Traits Test (OCEAN)

questions.question: I am someone who talks easily to others.
I am someone who tends to criticize others.
I do my work methodically.
I am often stressed or anxious.
I have an active imagination.

interpretations.Neuroticism: Neuroticism: Tendency to experience negative emotions
interpretations.Openness: Openness: Appreciation for art, adventure, ideas

big_five.summary: These results are indicative and do not constitute a diagnosis.

depression.name: PHQ-9 Test (Depression)

questions.question: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Poor appetite or overeating
Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way

depression.summary: This test (PHQ-9) is a screening tool and does not replace a professional diagnosis. If your results suggest possible depression, please consult a healthcare professional.

anxiety.name: GAD-7 Test (Anxiety)

questions.question: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
Not being able to stop or control worrying
Worrying too much about different things
Trouble relaxing
Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
Becoming easily annoyed or irritable
Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen

anxiety.summary: This test (GAD-7) is a screening tool and does not replace a professional diagnosis. If your results suggest possible anxiety, please consult a healthcare professional.
